main event: A group of miners in Brush Creek, California reported sightings of a saucer and small humanoid beings associated with it in 1953.
interesting points: The miners planned to ambush the saucer and its occupants, describing it as orange-colored and about four feet in diameter., Two gold miners claimed to have seen the saucer with little men inside, stating that the object was a bright metallic disc., Reports of the saucer's movements included it hovering and then taking off at high speed., Witnesses described hearing bell-like chimes coming from the little man while they observed him operating near the saucer., The miners' requests for permission to shoot at the saucer highlight the seriousness with which they regarded their encounters.
sighted object: an orange-colored flying saucer and small humanoid beings
witness description: miners and gold diggers in the area, described as sober and reputable
